import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './OrderConfirmationPage.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function OrderConfirmationPage() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', city: '', // Replacing gender with city monthlySubscription: '', // Replacing age with monthly subscription email: '', password: '', addressLine1: '', addressLine2: '', addressLine3: '', // Replacing country with addressLine3 pincode: '', phone: '', }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleInputChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Save form data to local storage localStorage.setItem('userDetails', JSON.stringify(formData)); console.log('Form submitted with details:', formData); // Clear form data after submission setFormData({ firstName: '', lastName: '', city: '', monthlySubscription: '', email: '', password: '', addressLine1: '', addressLine2: '', addressLine3: '', pincode: '', phone: '', }); // Navigate to the invoice page after submission navigate('/invoicepage'); }; return (

USER DETAILS

{/* Replacing Gender with City */}
{/* Replacing Age with Monthly Subscription */}

Billing Address

{/* Replacing Country with Address Line 3 */}
); } export default OrderConfirmationPage;
